summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2234 for the improvement of Third Avenue Northwest, from West Sixtieth Street to West Sixty-seventh Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by attaching fire hydrants to the existing water mains, with all necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 22832 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
